name: Biocats | NES
description:
BIOCATS

Story:

Not far in the future. 

'ZUBR' organization develops nano-insects to infect humanity. Two experimental cats Thom and Hunt run away from the laboratory to disturb them.

Let's help cats save the world!

Controls:

✜ - Move | A - Jump | B - Shoot

Download the ROM file and run it by an NES emulator ( Mesen ).

Follow us on Twitter: PB Games , Instagram p.b.games, Facebook p.b.games.2020 and  TikTok p.b.games.
